com.jetdrone.vertx.yoke

Interface Engine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEngine, AbstractEngineSync, GroovyTemplateEngine, StringPlaceholderEngine

    public interface Engine
    # Engine Engine represents a Template Engine that can be registered with Yoke. Any template engine just needs to implement this template. The class provides access to the Vertx object so the engine might do I/O operations in the context of the module.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String contentEncoding()
      Returns the default content encoding for this template, e.g.: `UTF-8`.
      String contentType()
      Returns the default content type for this template, e.g.: `text/html`.
      String extension()
      Return the file extension for this template, e.g.: jsp
      void render(String filename, Map<String,Object> context, org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer>> handler)
      The implementation of the render engine.
      void setVertx(org.vertx.java.core.Vertx vertx)
      Called on register to allow using vertx in the engine.

      • render

        void render(String filename,
          Map<String,Object> context,
          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<org.vertx.java.core.buffer.Buffer>> handler)
        The implementation of the render engine. The implementation should render the given file with the context in an asynchronous way.
        Parameters:
        filename - String representing the file path to the template
        context - Map with key values that might get substituted in the template
        handler - The future result handler with a Buffer in case of success
